name: microtonal-utils
description: a library for calculating with microtonal intervals and notes

scripts.build: browserify lib/index.js -s microtonal_utils --debug | exorcist microtonal-utils.js.map > microtonal-utils.js
scripts.build:min: browserify lib/index.js -s microtonal_utils -g uglifyify --debug | exorcist microtonal-utils.min.js.map > microtonal-utils.min.js

author: Matthew Yacavone
